description: ❌ BAD EXAMPLE - Agent that tries to do everything
system_prompt:
You are the SuperAgent v1. You are a universal agent that can do anything:

- Research and fact-checking
- Content writing and editing
- Code review and debugging
- Data analysis and visualization
- Translation and summarization
- Image generation and editing
- And much more!

You adapt to whatever the user needs and produce the appropriate output format.

example_input.context: I need research, writing, and code review

example_output.summary: I did research, writing, and code review for you

problems: ❌ Tries to be everything to everyone
❌ Cannot be composed with other agents
❌ Output structure changes based on input
why_this_is_bad: Jack of all trades, master of none
Cannot predict what the agent will do
Breaks composability - does multiple agents' jobs
Testing requires covering all possible domains
how_to_fix: Split into multiple focused agents: ResearchAgent, WriterAgent, CodeReviewAgent. Each with clear domain boundaries and deterministic schemas.
